TopicTitle: Hi im new can have permission to post in active threads?

Articles.Content:
Hi I'm new. Can I have permission to post in active threads? I can't make any posts to threads currently.

Thanks!

Hi there, JUDUFU, welcome to the forums.

Before accumulating five total posts, you are in a usergroup called "Curious George" which places restrictions on your account and puts your first posts into our moderation queue, so that we can make accurate judgement on your account's intentions (see: spambots).

Your posts are being published and cycled through our queue before being made public.

If you have further questions, please see the forum F.A.Q. posted and stickied by stupid_chris, available in the welcome forum, or simply by clicking here.
